Subskills.name: Master of Javelin
Subskills.description: Fire additional projectiles when using a throwing weapon.

Subskills.name: Power Current
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by astrope’s gift.

Subskills.name: Surging Stormbolt
Subskills.description: Lightning strikes now unleash an AoE pulse with increased area of effect radius and damage.

Subskills.name: Astrope's Curse
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict lightning break on hit.

Subskills.name: Astrope's Revenge
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional lightning bolt on hit.

Subskills.name: Rapid Momentum
Subskills.description: Grants you a stacking attack speed buff on hit. All stacks are lost if you miss.

Subskills.name: Lifestasis
Subskills.description: Lightning bolts deal increased damage based on target life.

Subskills.name: Ending Fate
Subskills.description: Increases damage to bosses when using polearms.

Subskills.name: Eye of Storm
Subskills.description: Summon a storm following you and rapidly shrinking. Hitting a monster causes the storm to grow in size.

Subskills.name: Astrope's Agility
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using astrope’s gift.

Subskills.name: Astrope's Dexterity
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using astrope’s gift.

Subskills.name: Zapping Voltage
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict stasis on hit.

Subskills.name: Thundering Storm
Subskills.description: Summons a thundering storm dealing area of effect damage for a short period instead of a lightning bolt.

Subskills.name: Critical Thunderbolt
Subskills.description: Lightning bolts can critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage when using polearms.
